statements: DELETE FROM rental_unit_usage WHERE unit_id = 101 AND total_expenditure > 1000.0;
DELETE FROM rental_unit_usage WHERE gas_usage < 50.0 AND electricity_usage > 200.0;
DELETE FROM utility_payments WHERE unit_id = 101 AND payment_date <= '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM rental_units WHERE total_expenditure > 1000 AND tenant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM expenditure WHERE unit_id = 101 AND gas_cost > 50;
DELETE FROM utility_usage WHERE electricity_usage > 100 AND water_usage < 50;
DELETE FROM expenditure WHERE electricity_cost + water_cost + gas_cost > 500;
DELETE FROM UtilityMeter WHERE meter_type = 'Electricity' AND usage_value > 1000;
DELETE FROM rental_units WHERE unit_name = 'Apartment A';
